name: A trip to the woods
description:
You are always late for class, using unbelievable excuse. One day your teacher,Miss Fant grew tired of your excuses and decide that if you are tardy one more time you will get expelled........ which you did. Lucky for you, you convince Miss Fant to give one more opportunity, which result in you babysitting one of the new student and getting lost in the woods.

Features

.2+ love interests/character routes 

. You can keep Mc’s default name, Blue, or take the lead in the story yourself with a custom name! 

.Take control of your destiny by picking first hand what you say or do in the story

.The Good and The Bad  can all be unraveled through your choices in the story! Determine your own fate and decide on your own ending!

Characters

Mc- The student who is always late but really intelligent 

Leo- The extroverted new student, Zero twin brother.

Zero- The introverted new students, Leo twin brother.

Miss Fant- The teacher who is always nice to everyone
